node.value: Liburuaren fitxategia behin betiko ezabatuko da. Ziur zaude?

node.name: message
node.value: %s book files will be removed irreversibly. Are you sure?

node.value: Ezin izan da cacheko direktorioa sortu

node.name: loginIsEmpty
node.value: Erabiltzaile izenak ezin du hutsik egon

node.name: initializationText
node.value:
FBReader-en eguneko aholkua irakurri nahi? Aholku berriak FBReader-en webgunetik deskargatuko dira, asteko 1-2 kbren neurrira.
Gaitu aholkuak?

node.name: message1
node.value: FBReader works in fullscreen mode by default. Tap center third of the screen to show controls. You can change this behaviour in “Appearance” section of the Settings dialog.

node.name: message2
node.value: Well done! Now tap the center third again to hide the controls and this hint. If you want to keep controls on the screen during reading, select “Show action bar” option in “Appearance” section of the Settings dialog.

node.name: title
node.value: Plugin for %s files is not installed. Install right now?

node.name: nativeCodeFailure
node.value: Error %s in native code during reading '%s'

node.name: unsupportedEncryptionMethod
node.value: File %s is encrypted with method that is not supported by FBReader. Some pages are not readable

node.name: cannotRunAndroidMarket
node.value: Ezin izan da Google Play-ra sartu. %s eskuz instalatu, mesedez

node.name: textNotFound
node.value: Ez dago bat egiten duen testurik liburuan, barkatu

node.name: bookNotFound
node.value: Ez dago bat egiten duen libururik liburutegian, barkatu

node.name: bookmarkNotFound
node.value: Ez dago bat egiten duen laster-markarik, barkatu

node.name: cannotOpenBook
node.value: Ezin da liburua une honetan ireki, barkatu

node.name: noFavorites
node.value: Zure gogokoen zerrenda hutsik dago, barkatu

node.name: videoServiceNotWorking
node.value: Video service is not available, sorry

node.name: videoPlayerNotFound
node.value: There is no installed video player on this device, sorry

node.name: bookIsMissing
node.value: Book '%s' is not found on the device, sorry

node.name: text
node.value: FBReader cache directory is not accessible for writing. May be you forget to insert or unmount your memory card. Please fix this issue or select another directory.

node.name: text
node.value: FBReader-ek ezin izan du bertako liburutegia kargatu. Baliteke egoki kargatuta ez izatea. Arazoa jarraitu ezkero saiatu FBReader berriro instalatzen, mesedez.

node.name: noMorePlugins
node.value: Oraingoz ez dugu gehigarri berririk, barkatu

node.name: summary
node.value: Connect Calibre server in your local network

node.name: frontScreenMessage
node.value: Eman buelta gailuari liburua irakurtzeko. Testua pantailara itzul daiten, sakatu beheko botoia.
